Description:
VACANT LAND.10 Glorious acres (approx.) IN MACCLESFIELD.
A unique opportunity to purchase a magnificent 10 acres (approx.) in an environment that can only be described as beautiful, tranquil and private. Situated in a prime Macclesfield location, this fully fenced and pastured property is widely sought after and seldom found! For the horse enthusiasts, there is an established fully fenced and sand based ménage, magnificent shade trees, picturesque surrounds and permanent wetlands at the rear of the property supporting an abundance of bird and wildlife. A rare opportunity to build your own dream home on a magnificent property with local riding trails, and the Macclesfield pony/adult riding club in close proximity.
Insights: 191 Spillers Road, Macclesfield VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
ROOM TO MOVE, THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME
***OPEN CANCELLED SORRY FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE***
This stylish Sienna home is only 3 years young with a 6 star energy rating and has all the bells and whistles for a modern lifestyle in the quaint country township of Gembrook.
Bathed in natural light this family residence has a versatile floorplan to accommodate a large family and still have room to move. Featuring: 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, multiple living zones, 11-foot ceilings in the lower level giving a light and breezy feel, the kitchen has an abundance of storage, SS appliances, huge counter space, a walk-in pantry, both appliance and recycling cupboards. Perfect for family gatherings. The outdoor entertaining area is equally as welcoming with a deck and stone paved area, lush flat lawns and views to the distant hills.
The décor here is contemporary, fresh and inviting, you can just move straight in with your furniture and feel straight at home.
Added extras include, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, double garage, plenty of off-street parking and room for the boat or caravan.
All this is here to tempt you on just over 1406 m2 of FLAT lush lawns and landscaped grounds, a fully fenced rear yard where you can watch the children at play or the four-legged family members.
Gembrook Township offers that idyllic country living feel yet has great amenities, cafes, restaurants, the IGA and more. Youll enjoy the toot of Puffing Billy close by and the chance to get home from the hustle and bustle of the day and enjoy spending time with the family, stress free in a fabulous home. Be sure to call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 to arrange a time to view what could be your next place to call home.

Description:
HORSE ENTHUSIASTS AND LIFESTYLE LOVERS ON 10 ACRES
Theres something magical about waking up each day to the dawn chorus of birds and greeting your horses on your own soil.
Enter this spectacular tree-lined 10-acre property to the comfortable 4 bedrooms (all with BIRs), 1 bathroom, AV Jennings split level brick veneer features a spacious updated kitchen with integrated dishwasher, under bench oven and cooktop and attractive wide benches. The lovely family bathroom with shower and separate bath. A full-length deck that is perfectly positioned to look across the paddocks and take in the commanding views to the Dandenong Ranges. Your own peaceful, private haven in close proximity to Emerald.
Some of the amazing features include:
Beautiful established bird attracting gardens
A dam stocked with native fish and supplies an underground watering system to the huge veggie patch and rose garden
8 x Water tanks
Day yard, a full-sized arena with mirror and light
A 20 x 20 all-weather round yard
Haysheds, loose boxes, day yards
Powered stables and tack rooms
Studio with kitchenette
Triple carport
8.5 x 14m powered shed
Multiple trail rides nearby.
Obviously 9 Miller Road, has all the trappings for equine pursuits with multiple horses, but it is also suitable for a variety of livestock, hobby farming or if you just want some peace and quiet and feel your own land under your feet. Whatever you need this property has it all, so be quick before it goes!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Picture perfect views on 1/2 acre
If you are looking for a perfectly situated ½ acre (approx) allotment with beautifully established gardens, rolling mountain views and walking distance to the heart of town that features great eateries, shops and the iconic puffing billy! Well look no further, this home has been loved for many years and is looking for the next loving owners to bring this great property and family home back to its former glory. The home has an open plan family and meals area, timber kitchen equipped with, gas cooking and a picturesque views, 3 bedrooms, central bathroom and a light and bright sun room. Special features include solar panels, gas heating and solid fuel fire for all those cosy nights. Stepping outside you have your own private oasis with a stunning in ground pool and paved area with fantastic views for when the family and friends comes over to visit, a separate studio with its own power, cooling and water that is perfect for teenagers retreat, work from home situation or the extra space your family deserves. Call today for an inspection.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
LIFESTYLE & ENTERTAINMENT PARADISE ON 28 ACRES
This 28 acre paradise, rarely found so close to town, is now offered for sale. The most prestigious, meticulously set up and maintained property in Emerald is waiting for you to just turn the key, walk in and enjoy. Located at the end of a no-through road enjoying 360 degree views with the most spectacular to the north-east over Emerald Lake Park towards the Warburton Ranges.
This quality, custom built home with large picture windows that frame established surrounding gardens. The quality extends into every room and is exemplified in the Blackwood timber kitchen with Miele appliances, updated bathrooms, hardwood timber skirting and architraves. Hydronic heating throughout.
There are three spacious living areas in addition to the full-length covered outdoor entertainment area with built-in fireplace that has catered for over 200 guests. Gather the clans and hold all your ceremonies & celebrations here.
The extensive ground work is done to establish the perfect hobby-farm. Two stables and a 40m x 20m arena. Cleared paddocks with excellent fencing, water troughs with float valves to each paddock and two dams. A wash bay & tack room complete with its own hot water service.
The extensive shedding "complex" is ideal for a tradesman, car enthusiast or hobbyist. The main shed comes with mezzanine levels - set-up your own mini-Bunnings onsite! In addition, a 3 bay hay/machinery shed.
Private inspections are welcomed. Call Katie Woods on 0428 744 498 to arrange.
Insights: 26 Ford Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
AS PRETTY AS A PICTURE ON 4000m2
Set on one acre of completely useable land is this character home that oozes beauty, charm and personality. Featuring all of the hallmarks of a timeless classic there are polished timber floors, decorative plasterwork, dado rails, fretwork and picture windows as well as all of the modern conveniences that make life easy.
Three separate living areas include formal lounge with gas log fire as a centrepiece, a large family room with study area that adjoins the kitchen and has double French doors out to the large covered deck and entertaining area plus a separate rumpus room that would make an ideal theatre room, tv room or childrens play area and has a crackling solid fuel fire to relax in front of on those cooler evenings. Every window offers wonderful views of the garden and the central kitchen allows the chef to enjoy the beautiful surrounds as you cook up a culinary masterpiece. There are plenty of cupboards, European appliances and a butlers pantry with a second sink and dishwasher to assist in food preparation. There are three bedrooms in the home, the master with full ensuite, all with built in robes and for those with older children, a fourth bedroom/teenagers pad behind the garage is a great space for them. This room could also suit as a work from home space or man cave. Ducted gas heating, split system and ceiling fans ensure year round comfort. Outdoors provides a paradise for the whole family with expansive grassed areas, oversized double carport, a huge garage with workshop area, access to the fully fenced rear yard, plenty of space for extra toys, work vehicles, caravan or boat and colourful established gardens. All of this situated a short distance from the kindergarten, Secondary college, renowned restaurant, shop and bus stop. This is a rare offering in a prestigious location.

Description:
Walk to Town, Classic Style, Flat Land Near an Acre, with Studio
Impressive is the word that comes to mind when you see this property.
Impressive location! Impressive parcel of land! Impressive 1960s construction! Impressive connections!
Just minutes from Gembrook Township and surrounded by quality homes in a semi-rural setting, this residence is on a fabulous flat allotment of just over 3300 m2 with filtered views to paddocks beyond.
Offering 3 bedrooms, all with pretty garden views, a study, a spacious lounge with feature fireplace, bright kitchen with great storage, Euromaid cooker, dual drawer dishwasher, barista alcove and meals area. There is a bathroom, shower room and separate WC, no more fighting over the bathroom here, another excellent idea from the 60s. PLUS! If you are a home hobbyist, musician, artist or someone interested in creative pursuits the studio space here is well worth inspecting, it can really be anything you need. PLUS! There is also a double garage and plenty of parking. The allotment boasts fenced section for our four-legged friends, also a chicken coop, sheep paddock and lovely fruit trees, cherry and fig. PLUS! You are on mains water and gas!!!!!
If you are looking to own a home on the outskirts of a great town and feel instantly welcome and at home, please call to arrange an inspection today. Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Mat Fitch 0473 363 606 are keen to take you through

Description:
Modern Marvel on 1/2 an Acre in a Private Location
Perfectly positioned to sit on the wide shady verandah and take in the green leafy outlook, forget the days stresses and relax.you are home, your own peaceful haven.
Featuring; 3 spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes, open and airy living spaces with vaulted ceilings, lounge with toasty wood fire, and any chef would be happy preparing meals in the well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, under bench oven and gas cook top. The lavish bathroom is on trend with black matt tapware, walk in shower, custom cabinetry with double vanity and the claw foot bath. There is ducted heating, wood fire and split systems to be comfortable all year round. To complete this superb property are a double garage, plenty of off street parking for the caravan, boat and trailer, landscaped grounds of just over ½ an acre that are fully fenced.
Location wise this home offers the best of both worlds, just far enough away to have that peaceful, quiet lifestyle yet be minutes to Emerald, schools, shops and bus connections. If youre active and like walks, you can stroll to Emerald Lake, walk through Wright Forest and Bellbird Crescent Reserve.
Its properties like this that make you realise how fortunate we are to call The Dandenong Ranges home, the community, the surrounds, the nature and the lifestyle. Mick and Amy are happy to take you through, please call Mick 0412 684 522 or Amy 0409 336 420 to make a time.

Description:
LIVE THE DREAM
Commanding an elevated position to take in the beautiful treed vistas this residence is as functional as it is beautiful.
Reluctantly, the current owners have changed circumstances, therefore an opportunity arises for the savvy home buyer to invest in a property that has been meticulously maintained and improved in its two-year existence. Just a sample of the upgrades include zoned refrigerated air conditioning, timber plantation shutters, quality window furnishings, security doors, new light fittings and professionally landscaped garden. Rest assured you can move in here and not need to spend a cent.
Families will enjoy the safe child friendly court position and the efficient floorplan which blends communal family zones and still offers parental privacy when required with the smart addition of a dividing door. The large north facing living areas, the outdoor dining space and the stunning landscaped grounds designed and planted by Natural Garden Scapes are the ultimate in both indoor and outdoor lifestyles.
The residence offers:
4 bedrooms all with robes
King sized master suite
Superbly appointed kitchen, double pantry, SS appliances
2 separate living areas
Bathroom with bath and separate shower
Ensuite and WIR to master
Roomy laundry
Oversized remote double garage with interior access
Outdoor covered dining
Abundant storage throughout
Double glazed windows
Caesarstone benchtops
Gas ducted heating
Zoned refrigerated air conditioning
If youre looking to escape to a tranquil existence in a welcoming township of community minded people, Gembrook will really be a pleasing tree-change. Somewhere you can see yourself living for a long time, raising the family or just having room to move in beautiful surrounds, 5 Kookaburra Court, Gembrook should be on the top of your list.

Description:
Vacant Land of 1150m2 approx
This rare residential land is being sold as part of a deceased estate. Seen as an extension to the garden of 20 - 22 Station Avenue (JUST SOLD) this plot has its own separate title and gives an opportunity for someone to build their dream home on this charming treelined street that runs parallel to the Puffing Billy line with walking tracks that descend into Emerald Lake Park.
Live in pretty seclusion within walking distance to Emerald township.
Services Available
- Water
- Gas
- Mains Sewer
- Electricity
Call Katie Woods on 0428 744 498 for more information on Zoning & Overlays that apply.

Description:
Dual Occupancy in the centre of Gembrook
This happy go lucky house in the centre of Gembrook was first built as a log cabin 60 years ago. It has grown into a dual occupancy within walking distance of all Gembrook has to offer; the fantastic Primary School, Spencers Cafe, the Independent and seconds from the nearly completed leisure park.
Split this house the way you need to, with two kitchens, two bathrooms at your disposal, you can mix and match to suit the requirements of your family or as a strategic investment. Both kitchens come with a meal/living area with a lounge room in between with picture windows overlooking the rolling hills.
All five bedrooms have double BIRs.
The walls are freshly painted, the carpeting and flooring is all new and both bathrooms recently updated. Warmed by a wood-fired heater and cooled by a split system.
This house offers a clear "hills flat" quarter acre hosting King Parrots and Galahs amongst the lemon, persimmons, fruiting feijoa trees. Enjoy the back veranda in the shade of the large tree ferns in the knowledge that it is fully fenced for the safety of all the little legged in your life. Or enjoy a sun warmed BBQ on the marvellous front deck overlooking the ever changing beauty of Gembrook amongst the magnolias.
This cheerful abode is waiting for you.

Description:
THE BEST BLOCK IN TOWN?
***OFFERS CLOSING 5PM TUESDAY 26TH NOVEMBER***
As the old saying goes, they aint making any more land. There are very few blocks of land left and even fewer as good as this one. What we have here is approximately 900m2 of Hills flat land within walking distance to Avonsleigh Store, Bam Bam restaurant and Emerald Secondary College you can build your dream home here! (subject to council approval). Dream it! Design it! Do it!
If youd like to chat more about this property or to make an appointment call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 and Amy Fairway 0409 336 420.
***PLEASE NOTE THAT THE HOUSE NEXT DOOR IS ALSO AVAILABLE FOR SALE***

Description:
Easy Hills Living!
This tranquil retreat just minutes from Gembrook township provides the ideal escape to come home to and unwind. Situated on a lovely ½ acre allotment, this delightful 2 bedroom home includes a living area with cosy wood fire heater, spacious kitchen/meals and a study. With contemporary tones and large windows, this lovely home is light and airy.
A large covered entertaining area wraps around two sides of this home and offers the perfect space to relax with friends or family all year round. A glass sliding door opens the living room to the outdoor entertaining area ideal for contemporary indoor/outdoor living.
The wide driveway sweeps up past this home to a separate two room studio with power and then onto an impressively large 3 car garage/workshop complete with polished concrete floor, power, specially built workshop benches, mezzanine floor, remote door and large lean to carport on the side.
This large block is fully fenced so there is plenty of space for kids and pets to play safely. Mature trees and low maintenance gardens provides the space and tranquillity that will allure you to this wonderful property.
Inspect today, you will not be disappointed.
Bethany Day 0438 844 968 Aaron Day 0407 365 994
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
EASY LIVING IN A PRIME LOCATION!
Nestled in a quiet leafy location and only minutes walk to the heart of town, transport, cafes, schools & sporting facilities is this fantastic opportunity to finally enjoy the low maintenance lifestyle you deserve! The comfortable brick home boasts 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, 2 new modern bathrooms, gas ducted heating, wood fire, air-conditioning, polished floorboards & light filled living zones so you can be sure you will love living here! Outside you will enjoy the landscaped gardens, flat lawns & an excellent garage/storage/workshop which is perfect for those that like to tinker away on projects! Whether you are looking for your first home, investment or if very little maintenance appeals to you then this is the home for you! Call us & inspect today!

Description:
PEACE AND QUIET WITH MAGICAL VIEWS IN CENTRAL EMERALD
Superbly maintained and immaculately presented this brick and timber home offers the very best lifestyle in the picturesque village of Emerald. If the jaw dropping views arent impressive enough in their own right, youre sure to be enamoured by the welcoming vibe and an interior bathed with natural light. Every detail of this home has been well attended to.
Featuring:
4 bedrooms, 3 with BIRs, the main with ensuite
Spacious bathroom with separate shower and bath, custom vanity and plantation shutters
A chefs delight kitchen with high end appliances by Miele, both a pyrolytic and a steam oven, dishwasher, microwave and fridge
Dining room and separate lounge with cosy gas fire
The deck has been carefully designed to maximise the view and minimise obstructions, it just flows from inside to out showcasing the most wonderful landscapes and cloud formations. Many a summers evening will be spent here hosting gatherings with family and friends.
Just over ¼ acre fully fenced allotment of low maintenance, pretty bird attracting gardens
Outdoors has sealed driveway access, a double carport & under house workshop and storage
Also, some fabulous additions including new carpet, LED lights, shutters on the north side, tank water for the garden
Both heating and cooling
Upon inspection, the tranquility here will make you feel miles away, yet you can walk into town on a sealed road to all Emerald has to offer including schools, shops, cafes and bus connections to Belgrave and if driving, Wellington Road access to the M1 and Eastlink is merely minutes away. Living in Emerald doesnt get any better than this, why not come and see why? Were looking forward to showing you through, so call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
IMMACULATE IN EVERY WAY WITH ONE OWNER SINCE THE MID 70S
Immaculately maintained, this home is low maintenance and comprises ample living spaces including lounge, meals and family room. You love the central kitchen with near new Westinghouse under bench oven and hotplates, there is plenty of storage and a dishwasher. All the bedrooms are light filled, have robes, the main with a full ensuite, there is also a study and secret wine cellar. The updated family bathroom is light and bright with a bath/shower combination all in an on-trend palette. Particularly pleasing are the lovely hard wood polished floorboards, toasty wood fire and the convenience of ducted heating. Outdoors is sure to be enjoyed all year round, the pretty gardens are full of colour, birds love to visit, and entertaining is stress free with an under-cover deck, paved sections and built in spa. If you settled in soon, youll be set up for a summer of BBQs and family gatherings. Set on just over a 900m2 allotment (with the option of purchasing the next door 900m2 of vacant land), this property also has shedding, a wood store and a circular driveway with drive through carport. There is literally not one more cent to spend, even the roof has been upgraded. The location is fantastic, walk to the Avonsleigh General Store, the bus stop is here and you might like to stop for a great coffee at Bam Bam restaurant.
If youd like to chat more about this property or to make an appointment call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 and Amy Fairway 0409 336 420.
***PLEASE NOTE THAT THE LAND NEXT DOOR IS ALSO AVAILABLE FOR SALE***

Description:
Quality Home on Picturesque Gardens
*Three bedrooms with ample opportunity to convert the formal dining room to a fourth*
Surrounded by 2,150 sqm of Botanical style gardens, this craftsman-built family home will satisfy the most fastidious of buyers.
The kitchen and bathrooms have been recently renovated, incorporating Caesarstone bench tops. The large kitchen and adjoining meals area are at the heart of the home and there is a large family/rumpus room, with 2 study nooks discretely tucked behind feature doors. All the windows provide you with a view of the majestic mountain ranges or a cascade of colour provided by the incredible variety of shrubs and trees including a variety of mature Roses, Camelias and magnolias.
• Double brick home
• Colonial windows with locks
• Flooring - Slate, carpet and Tasmanian Oak hardwood floorboards
• 8 Ceiling roses and decorative cornicing throughout house
• Gold-plated light fittings and door handles
• Quality curtains with polished brass rods over windows and doors
• Gold-plated tapware and sinkware
• Double glazed and tinted windows
• Double glazed doors
• Insulation and sisalation in roof
• Bevelled internal glass doors
• Under-floor slab electric heating (with individual room control)
• 2 Gas heaters
• Split system air-conditioning and 3 x Ceiling Fans
• Instant gas hot water system
• Alfresco area
• Single carport
• Caravan or boat carport
• Large work shed with mezzanine floor
• Garden shed with power
• Attic storage
• CCTV Monitoring of House, Garage and Shed - can be viewed from remote location
• Security lighting
• Alarm system
• Two driveways
• Immaculate gardens
• Drip system in garden
• Timber garden gazebo for tea parties
• Garden lighting and fountain
• Double garage plus area for Gym (air-conditioned)
FIXED DATE SALE 10/12/2019 AT 6PM UNLESS SOLD PRIOR

Description:
A PERFECT HOME IN CENTRAL EMERALD ON OVER 1100m2
Nestled amongst a leafy setting of established gardens is this much loved home that offers light filled, open plan living featuring rich floating floors, neutral décor and a sliding door that leads out to the verandah where a stunning outlook can be enjoyed. The adjoining kitchen offers plenty of cupboards and bench space, gas hot plates, wall oven and dishwasher. Gas ducted heating and a split system ensures year round comfort. At the end of the road you can pursue your passion for nature and take a stroll along the picturesque trail that leads beside the Menzies Creek and can take you to the Avard picnic ground and beyond. Presented as neat as a pin, this one owner home offers a rare opportunity for you to secure a lovely home in a great location within easy reach of Emerald township and is a short drive to Wellington Road which leads to both the Monash and Eastern Freeways.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Amazing Views! Dual Living! Lifestyle Property!
Several generations of the one family can live here and have privacy, peace and quiet and share in a wonderful country setting with jaw dropping views over Cardinia Reservoir, just minutes to Emerald Township. You may be interested in the possibility of a B&B business (subject to council approval), the options here are endless.
Over three levels and showcasing:
Top Level:
4 bedrooms all with BIRs
Main with breath taking views, lounge, full ensuite and balcony access
3 with network points
TV room
Study nook with NBN
Balcony
Lavish bathroom with double vanity, soaking tub and walk in shower
Central Level, the hub of the home:
Well-appointed contemporary kitchen with quality appliances including LG fridge/freezer, abundant storage, quality appliances, a huge island, Silestone benchtops
Custom fitted office
Dining room with incredible views
Spacious family room with fireplace
Bathroom and laundry
Lower Level:
Self-contained unit with internal access and separate access
Modern kitchen with stove and dishwasher
Bathroom and European Laundry
Spacious bedroom with WIR
Outdoor covered entertaining area
Outdoors:
Fully fenced
Garage x 2 plus workshop
Plenty of parking
Outdoor area for entertaining
Shedding and cubby
With so many fabulous features mentioned and so much to see it really is worth your time to inspect 7 Steel Road in Emerald. Give Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 a call to discuss a suitable time. We are proud to show you through.

Description:
Peace And Tranquillity On Almost 1/2 An Acre!
Perfectly positioned in a peaceful no through road is this beautiful elevated residence that is set on a landscaped allotment of almost half an acre benefitting from a lovely outlook. The stunning family home will cater for the largest family and has been designed so that it can be used for an extended family or a work from home situation as there are two distinct areas with their own entrances. Offering 3 spacious living areas that include a lounge room with a crackling solid fuel fire as a centrepiece, a big meals/family area and a separate rumpus room. The modern French provincial style kitchen is in the heart of the home and offers stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and plenty of cupboards and bench space. Boasting designer style, light filled living rooms and soaring ceilings the theme throughout is one of total luxury, style and flair. There are 5 generously sized bedrooms all with built in robes and 2 modern bathrooms. Split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans and ducted heating provide year round comfort. The whole property has been thoughtfully landscaped to cater for kids, pets and entertaining and offers large lawn area, mature established gardens with the perfect mix of flowering ornamentals and natives. Also on offer is a large paved entertaining area that makes the most of a picturesque outlook and is an ideal place to entertain friends and family. A sealed driveway, garden shed, under-house storage and solar panels completes an ideal property. Located within easy reach of everything that the beautiful town of Emerald has to offer and yet privately situated to enjoy the tranquillity that surrounds you, you can make the most of the relaxed lifestyle you crave.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
